On 12/09/2012 05:40, Jeff Clune wrote:
> I am pleased to announce that I have accepted a tenure-track faculty
> position at the University of Wyoming.
Hi Jeff,
	As they say around here "Cracking good news, lad". I wish you
well, and look forward to developments.

Rob Marsden
